p.s: The drama A Raisin in the Sun, written by Lorraine Hansberry and first published in 1959, is about an African-American family who lives in a very small apartment in Chicago.
Family Younger is very poor and havehas to share their bathroom with many others.
One day Lena's husband died and the family gets a cheque with 10000$.
Every family-memberfamily member has their own dream on what to do with the money.
Lena's kids Beneatha and Walter wish to get a good job to become rich.
Beneatha loved to be a doctor and Walter is dreaming about his own liquor store.
Walter's wife Ruth has nearly the same dream like Lena.
They want to buy a house with an own room for Ruth's son Travis and a garden.
